tool_description: Get graphic design task done. Instantly. We help you and your customers to create professional graphic designs. With our API, we improve your design and make recommendations automatically using best-in-class algorithms and artificial intelligence. We help you and your customers to create professional graphic designs. With our API, we improve your design and make recommendations automatically using best-in-class algorithms and artificial intelligence. Logoraisr API uses Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms to get graphic design task done, instantly! These tasks could be increase the image resolution of logos or convert them to vectors.
name: logoraisr
title: logoraisr

api_list.name: Process Image
api_list.description:
Create a new project to process the referenced image. This POST-Method creates a new project. 

Available processes are:  
**logo-super-resolution**
**logo-to-vector**
**logo-segmentation**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://logoraisr.p.rapidapi.com/rest-v1/projects/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logoraisr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://logoraisr.p.rapidapi.com/rest-v1/projects/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "logoraisr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Upload Image
api_list.description: Upload a new image. This POST method uploads a new file to the server and returns the` file_id`. The `file_id` specifies the image to which the image processing should be applied.
